start_welcome:
👋 Welcome! To use this bot, please provide your OpenRouter API key using `/setkey YOUR_API_KEY`.

Use `/help` to see all available commands.
start_welcome_authorized:
👋 Welcome back! You are already authorized.

Your current settings:
Model: `{model}`
System Prompt: `{systemPrompt}`

Use `/help` to see available commands.
key_required: ⚠️ Please set your OpenRouter API key first using `/setkey YOUR_API_KEY`.
key_set_success: ✅ Your OpenRouter API key has been saved successfully!
key_verification_failed: ❌ API Key verification failed. Please check your key and try again.
model_select_prompt:
🤖 Please select an AI model using `/setmodel MODEL_ID` (e.g., `openai/gpt-4o`).

You can find model IDs on the OpenRouter website.
settings_reset_success: ✅ All your settings (API Key, Model, System Prompt) have been reset. Please use `/setkey` to start again.
ask_error: ❌ An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
unauthorized: 🚫 Sorry, you are not authorized to use this bot.
generic_error: ❌ An unexpected error occurred. Please contact the administrator.
new_chat_success: ✅ Conversation history cleared. Starting a new chat.
search_keys_missing: ⚠️ Web search functionality requires Google API Key and CX to be configured by the bot administrator.
search_error: ❌ An error occurred during the web search. Please try again later.
search_no_results: ℹ️ No web search results found for "{query}".
summary_no_results: ℹ️ No previous search results found to summarize. Please use /search first.
models_list_error_nodata: ℹ️ No models found or unable to retrieve the list. Please check your API key.
models_list_error_generic: ❌ An error occurred while fetching the model list. Please try again later.
model_fetch_error: ❌ Could not validate the model ID with OpenRouter. Please ensure the model ID is correct and your API key is valid.
lang_set_format: ❌ Invalid command format. Use `/setlang en` or `/setlang id`.
lang_set_invalid: ❌ Invalid language code. Please select one:
persona_set_success: ✅ Persona set to: {persona}. The system prompt has been updated.
persona_set_invalid: ❌ Invalid persona name. Use `/setpersona <name>`. Available personas: {personas}
help:
🤖 *Available Commands:*

• /start - Start the bot
• /setkey [API_KEY] - Save your OpenRouter API key
• /changemodel - Choose a new AI model
• /setsystemprompt [PROMPT] - Set custom system prompt (empty to reset)
• /setpersona [name] - Set predefined persona (e.g. default, coder)
• /setlang [en|id] - Set preferred language
• /resetsettings - Clear all settings
• /ask [QUESTION] - Ask the AI (remembers history)
• /newchat - Start new conversation
• /search [QUERY] - Web search
• /togglesearch - Enable/disable web search
• /managetoken - Manage your API token
• /help - Show this message
token_revoked: ✅ Your API token has been revoked
token_regenerated: ✅ A new API token has been generated
